## Para Mods

```sh
cd /home/steam/arkserver/ShooterGame/Content/Mods
```
```sh
chmod -R 775 537753733 543859212 558651608 924933745 2967012198 1974423293 1995303438 2020317130 2594067220
```

```sh
chmod 775 537753733.mod 543859212.mod 558651608.mod 924933745.mod 2967012198.mod 1974423293.mod 1995303438.mod 2020317130.mod 2594067220.mod
```

```sh
chown -R steam:steam 537753733 543859212 558651608 924933745 2967012198 1974423293 1995303438 2020317130 2594067220
```

```sh
chown steam:steam 537753733.mod 543859212.mod 558651608.mod 924933745.mod 2967012198.mod 1974423293.mod 1995303438.mod 2020317130.mod 2594067220.mod
```
